org.hps.evio

Class Phys2019SvtEvioReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.evio.EvioReader
      • org.hps.evio.AbstractSvtEvioReader
        • org.hps.evio.Phys2019SvtEvioReader

  • public class Phys2019SvtEvioReader
extends AbstractSvtEvioReader
    SVT EVIO reader used to convert 2019 Physics Run SVT raw data to LCIO objects.
